SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractMazeSolver
Abstract base class providing common functionalities for maze solvers.
AlgorithmController
Controller for the algorithms This class is responsible for managing the algorithm buttons and their actions
AStarSolver
Implementation of the A* algorithm for solving mazes.
BFSsolver
Breadth-First Search (BFS) implementation for solving mazes.
DFSGenerator
 
DFSsolver
Depth-First Search (DFS) implementation for solving mazes.
DijkstraSolver
Implementation of Dijkstra's algorithm for maze solving.
Edges
The Edges class represents a connection between two vertices in the maze graph.
GeneratorControlleur
Controller responsible for maze generation.
Graph
Representation of a graph using an adjacency list.
GraphEditor
 
GraphView
GraphView is a JavaFX component that visually represents a graph structure.
KruskalGenerator
This class creates a maze following the kruskal algorithm, which extracts a spanning tree from the current Graph in case the user selected the perfect maze generation or an imcomplete graph otherwise.
Launcher
Entry point of the MazeApp application.
Main
Main JavaFX entry point of the MazeApp application.
MainControlleur
Main controller for the maze application.
MazeEditor
 
MazeGenerator
This interface is intended to be implemented in order to specify the maze generator methods.
MazeGenerator.mazeType
Enumeration containing booleans where each field represents the type of maze generated
MazeSolver
Common interface for all maze solving algorithms.
MazeView
MazeView is the visual representation of the maze.
OnlyLeftSolver
Maze solver using the "Always Turn Left" strategy.
OnlyRightSolver
Maze solver using the "Always Turn Right" strategy.
RandomSolver
Maze solver using the Random Walk algorithm.
SaveManager
Manager class responsible for saving and loading mazes to/from a file.
SaveManager.SavedMaze
Represents a saved maze with seed, dimensions, and edge list.
SaveView
UI component for managing saved mazes.
TerminalView
Provides a terminal-based interface for generating and solving mazes.
UserPlaySolver
Allows a user to manually navigate through a maze using keyboard input (ZQSD).
